text: Me: It is my favorite one!
Me: They call it chameleon flower.
Date: Hihi, because it can change its color?
Me: It is because it looks like a chameleon, when you turn your head like this...
Date: Oh! Now! I see it!
Date: Hihi, how did you know?
Me: I have the great chameleoncyclopaedia one to three at home.
Me: You can borrow it, if you want.
Date: Oh, I always wanted to read it!
Date: I will totally come and borrow it, hihi.
